text: Jerry Angelo Brooks (born December 16, 1965), known as J. B. Smoove, is an American actor, writer and comedian. He was a writer and performer on NBC's Saturday Night Live (2003–05). He is best known for his roles on HBO's Curb Your Enthusiasm (2007–present) and the CBS sitcom The Millers (2013–15). ==References== Category:1965 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American voice actors Category:American television writers Category:Comedians from North Carolina Category:Actors from North Carolina Category:Writers from North Carolina
title: J. B. Smoove
